item.title: Michael Franti and Activist Artist Management Split Following Allegations of Sexual Misconduct
item.description: Pop-reggae artist Michael Franti is no longer represented by Activist Artist Management, Variety has confirmed. The split comes after accusations of sexual misconduct were levied at Franti, initiated
